description: Variation of condition 1 (time limit) to allow the use and associated lighting and signage to be removed 40 months after commencement of planning permission 00793/L/P1 approved 03/11/2017 for the construction of a 32 car space temporary car park for Lidl which will be in operation for a maximum of 18 months
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The use hereby approved shall cease and all lighting and signage associated with the use removed on 29 November 2020. The hereby approved use shall not commence any later than 3 years after the date of this decision. Once use ceases the land shall be restored to undeveloped form or in accordance with another scheme of work submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority within two years of the use ceasing.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Planning Statement, MAJOR-2014-FELTHAM-2600-003, MAJOR-2014-FELTHAM-2600-004. Received: 1st August 2017, Operational and trolley management plan, Additional Planning Statement, Parking sign type 1, parking sign type 2 and MAJOR-2014-FELTHAM-2600-002. Received: 20th September 2017 ) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - A splay of 2.4m x 2.4m shall be provided on each side of the access, the depth measured from the back of the footway and the widths outwards from the edges of the access, and no fence, wall or other obstruction to visibility exceeding 0.6m in height above the surface of the adjoining highway shall be erected within the areas of such splays.

Condition : 4 - Once the hereby approved temporary use has ceased the proposed crossover as shown on the submitted plans shall be permanently closed and reinstated as footway in consultation with the local Highways Authority.

Condition : 5 - The hereby approved use as a temporary car park shall not be used outside of the following times: Monday to Saturday: 8am to 10pm and Sunday 11am to 5pm, outside of these times the gates shall be closed and locked.

Condition : 6 - Prior to the commencement of the hereby approved use the applicant shall have entered into a Traffic Management Order for the management of the car park during opening hours. The Traffic Management Order shall stay in place for the duration of the use.
